text: The Oscar - winning actress talks to the legendary interviewer about everything from pay equity ( ` ` I had it up to my f — ing eyeballs'' ) to her dealings with Harvey ( ` ` He had only been nice to me — except for when he wasn't'' ) to where she sees herself in 20 years : ` ` I won't have periods anymore, that's a bonus.''
